abstract: The announcement proved to be a fresh blow to investor confidence in the company, as shares slid nearly 4 percent in Paris trading.
snippet: The announcement proved to be a fresh blow to investor confidence in the company, as shares slid nearly 4 percent in Paris trading.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, Nov. 5 — The parent of Airbus, European Aeronautic Defense and Space, warned Monday that delays of up to a year for its latest multibillion-dollar military transport aircraft program would reduce third-quarter earnings by as much as $2 billion.

headline.main: EADS Warns It Will Take a Hit From Delayed Military Plane
headline.print_headline: EADS Warns It Will Take a Hit From Delayed Military Plane
